metadataAttributes.description: Comprehensive performance analytics for MagicStream Entertainment content library with advertising and monetization insights
metadataAttributes.data_source: MagicStream platform analytics, viewer behavior tracking, and advertising performance data
metadataAttributes.content_categories: Original Series, Live Sports, Documentary, Kids Series, Reality Competition, Performance Special
metadataAttributes.completion_rates: 82%-97% with live sports achieving highest rates
metadataAttributes.cpm_multipliers: 1.1x-2.1x with live sports commanding premium pricing
metadataAttributes.demographic_coverage: All ages with family co-viewing rates 23%-91%
metadataAttributes.device_breakdown: Smart TV dominant (40%-78%), Mobile secondary (18%-45%), Tablet tertiary (4%-20%)
metadataAttributes.brand_safety_scores: 95%-99.2% with family content achieving highest scores
metadataAttributes.geographic_performance: North America, Europe, Australia primary markets with international appeal variations
metadataAttributes.social_sentiment: 8.4-9.2 scores with high engagement across platforms
metadataAttributes.advertising_demand: 8.1-9.8 scores with live sports and family content leading
metadataAttributes.business_applications: content acquisition decisions, advertising inventory pricing, audience targeting, brand safety assessment
